medical_history.history_of_present_illness: 18 hour history of abdominal pain, initially diffuse, migrating to right lower quadrant (RLQ). Pain is well localized, moderate to severe intensity, sharp, non-radiating, exacerbated by movement, with no significant relieving symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, obesity, depression; previous left humeral fracture repair, left lower extremity trauma with flap/skin graft reconstruction.
medical_history.family_history: No history of inflammatory bowel disease.
